name: grequests
raw_recipe:
{%set name = "grequests" %}
{%set version = "0.3.0" %}
{%set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{%set hash_val = "0f41c4eee83bab39f5543af49665c08681637a0562a5704a3f7b2e4a996531c9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash_val }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - gevent
    - requests

test:
  imports:
    - grequests

about:
  home: https://github.com/kennethreitz/grequests
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  # license_file: No MANIFEST included in package - see https://github.com/kennethreitz/grequests/issues/95
  license_family: BSD
  summary: 'Requests + Gevent'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pmlandwehr
